thing.title: Wiimote Tripod Attachment
thing.author: Matt
thing.description: I like to call this the wiimote mount. It is an attachment that allows you to mount a wiimote (the Nintendo wii console remote) to a tripod. Many of you may be asking yourselves, why would i want to mount my wiimote to a tripod?youtube.com/watch?v=QgKCrGvShZs&feature;=related(this video will show you why)
